-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
	-- 1. 	MANIPULATE GENERAL LEDGER
	-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
	-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
	-- 1.1	CREATE WIP JOURNALS
	-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
	
	IF OBJECT_ID('Core.GL_JE_Lines','U') IS NOT NULL DROP TABLE Core.GL_JE_Lines
	SELECT	*,
			CAST(ISNULL(ACCOUNTED_DR,0) AS MONEY) - CAST(ISNULL(ACCOUNTED_CR,0) AS MONEY) AS ACCOUNTED_AMOUNT,
			CAST(ISNULL(ENTERED_DR,0) AS MONEY) - CAST(ISNULL(ENTERED_CR,0) AS MONEY) AS ENTERED_AMOUNT
	INTO Core.GL_JE_Lines
	FROM	(	
				SELECT		[JE_HEADER_ID], [JE_LINE_NUM], [LAST_UPDATE_DATE], [LAST_UPDATED_BY], [LEDGER_ID], [CODE_COMBINATION_ID], [PERIOD_NAME], [EFFECTIVE_DATE], [STATUS], [CREATION_DATE], [CREATED_BY], [ENTERED_CR], [ACCOUNTED_CR], [DESCRIPTION], [ENTERED_DR], [ACCOUNTED_DR], [Stamp]
				FROM		[RAW].[O.GL_JE_LINES] 
				UNION
				SELECT		[JE_HEADER_ID], [JE_LINE_NUM], [LAST_UPDATE_DATE], [LAST_UPDATED_BY], [LEDGER_ID], [CODE_COMBINATION_ID], [PERIOD_NAME], [EFFECTIVE_DATE], [STATUS], [CREATION_DATE], [CREATED_BY], [ENTERED_CR], [ACCOUNTED_CR], [DESCRIPTION], [ENTERED_DR], [ACCOUNTED_DR], [Stamp]
				FROM		[RAW].[O.GL_JE_LINES_2023] 
				UNION
				SELECT		[JE_HEADER_ID], [JE_LINE_NUM], [LAST_UPDATE_DATE], [LAST_UPDATED_BY], [LEDGER_ID], [CODE_COMBINATION_ID], [PERIOD_NAME], [EFFECTIVE_DATE], [STATUS], [CREATION_DATE], [CREATED_BY], [ENTERED_CR], [ACCOUNTED_CR], [DESCRIPTION], [ENTERED_DR], [ACCOUNTED_DR], [Stamp]
				FROM		[RAW].[O.GL_JE_LINES_2022] 
				UNION
				SELECT		[JE_HEADER_ID], [JE_LINE_NUM], [LAST_UPDATE_DATE], [LAST_UPDATED_BY], [LEDGER_ID], [CODE_COMBINATION_ID], [PERIOD_NAME], [EFFECTIVE_DATE], [STATUS], [CREATION_DATE], [CREATED_BY], [ENTERED_CR], [ACCOUNTED_CR], [DESCRIPTION], [ENTERED_DR], [ACCOUNTED_DR], [Stamp]
				FROM		[RAW].[O.GL_JE_LINES_2021]
				UNION
				SELECT		[JE_HEADER_ID], [JE_LINE_NUM], [LAST_UPDATE_DATE], [LAST_UPDATED_BY], [LEDGER_ID], [CODE_COMBINATION_ID], [PERIOD_NAME], [EFFECTIVE_DATE], [STATUS], [CREATION_DATE], [CREATED_BY], [ENTERED_CR], [ACCOUNTED_CR], [DESCRIPTION], [ENTERED_DR], [ACCOUNTED_DR], [Stamp]
				FROM		[RAW].[O.GL_JE_LINES_2020]
				WHERE		[PERIOD_NAME] LIKE '%21%'
			) je

	-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
	-- 1.2	Build Segments in Scope table
	-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------	

	IF OBJECT_ID('Core.GL_SegmentsInScope','U') IS NOT NULL DROP TABLE Core.GL_SegmentsInScope
	;WITH IDs AS (
	SELECT 		DISTINCT CODE_COMBINATION_ID 
	FROM 		Core.GL_JE_Lines
	UNION 
	SELECT 		DISTINCT CODE_COMBINATION_ID 
	FROM 		[RAW].[O.GL_BALANCES]
	)
	SELECT 		DISTINCT i.CODE_COMBINATION_ID, 
				SEGMENT1, SEGMENT2, SEGMENT3, SEGMENT4, SEGMENT5, 
				SEGMENT6
	INTO 		Core.GL_SegmentsInScope 
	FROM 		IDs i
	LEFT JOIN 	[RAW].[O.GL_CODE_COMBINATIONS] gcc 
	ON 			gcc.CODE_COMBINATION_ID = i.CODE_COMBINATION_ID

	-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
	-- 1.3	Build Max Dates table
	-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------	

	IF OBJECT_ID('Core.GL_MaxDates','U') IS NOT NULL DROP TABLE Core.GL_MaxDates
	SELECT		FLEX_VALUE,
				VALUE_CATEGORY ,
				COUNT(*) AS [rowcount], 
				MAX(CAST(LEFT([LAST_UPDATE_DATE],10) AS DATE)) AS [maxdate]
	INTO		Core.GL_MaxDates
	FROM		[RAW].[O.FND_FLEX_VALUES_VL]
	WHERE		[VALUE_CATEGORY] IN ('Account Argent','Company Argent','Cost Centre Argent')
	GROUP BY	FLEX_VALUE
	,			VALUE_CATEGORY
	HAVING		COUNT(*) > 1

	-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
	-- 1.4	Build Flex Value Max Date table
	-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------	
	
	IF OBJECT_ID('Core.GL_FlexValueMaxDate','U') IS NOT NULL DROP TABLE Core.GL_FlexValueMaxDate
	SELECT		fv.*, 
				CASE WHEN md.MaxDate IS NULL THEN CAST(LEFT([LAST_UPDATE_DATE],10) AS DATE) ELSE MaxDate END AS [MaxDate]
	INTO		Core.GL_FlexValueMaxDate
	FROM		[RAW].[O.FND_FLEX_VALUES_VL] fv
	LEFT JOIN	Core.GL_MaxDates md 
	ON 			fv.FLEX_VALUE = md.flex_value
	AND			fv.Value_Category = md.VALUE_CATEGORY
	WHERE		fv.[VALUE_CATEGORY] IN ('Account Argent','Company Argent','Cost Centre Argent')

	-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
	-- 1.5	Build GL Descriptions table
	-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------	

	IF OBJECT_ID('Core.GL_Descriptions','U') IS NOT NULL DROP TABLE Core.GL_Descriptions
	;WITH S AS (
				SELECT 'SEGMENT' AS SEGMENT, '' AS [VALUE_CATEGORY]
	UNION 		SELECT DISTINCT SEGMENT1, 'Company Argent' AS [VALUE_CATEGORY] FROM Core.GL_SegmentsInScope	
	UNION  		SELECT DISTINCT SEGMENT3, 'Account Argent' AS [VALUE_CATEGORY] FROM Core.GL_SegmentsInScope	
	UNION  		SELECT DISTINCT SEGMENT2, 'Cost Centre Argent' AS [VALUE_CATEGORY] FROM Core.GL_SegmentsInScope 	
	UNION  		SELECT DISTINCT SEGMENT2, 'Cost Centre Argent' AS [VALUE_CATEGORY] FROM Core.GL_SegmentsInScope 	
	),			
	FMV AS (
	SELECT		DISTINCT fv.FLEX_VALUE, fv.DESCRIPTION, fv.VALUE_CATEGORY
	FROM		Core.GL_FlexValueMaxDate fv
	INNER JOIN	Core.GL_FlexValueMaxDate md 
	ON 			fv.FLEX_VALUE_ID = md.FLEX_VALUE_ID 
	AND 		CAST(LEFT(fv.[LAST_UPDATE_DATE],10) AS DATE) = md.MaxDate
	)
	SELECT		S.SEGMENT
	,			FMV.*
	INTO		Core.GL_Descriptions
	FROM		FMV
	LEFT JOIN   S
	ON 			FMV.FLEX_VALUE = S.SEGMENT
	AND			FMV.VALUE_CATEGORY = S.VALUE_CATEGORY
	WHERE 		S.SEGMENT IS NOT NULL

-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
-- 1.6	Create table containing budget information
-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

	IF OBJECT_ID('tempdb..#BudgetBalances','U') IS NOT NULL DROP TABLE #BudgetBalances
	IF OBJECT_ID('[Finance].[BudgetBalances]','U') IS NOT NULL DROP TABLE [Finance].[BudgetBalances]

	SELECT		gcc.[PERIOD_NAME] AS [Period Name]
	,			CAST(CASE WHEN gp.PERIOD_NUM = '13' THEN '12' ELSE RIGHT(CONCAT('0',gp.PERIOD_NUM),2) END AS INT) AS [Financial Period]
	,			CONCAT('20',RIGHT(gcc.[PERIOD_NAME],2)) AS [Financial Year]
	,			[BUDGET_NAME] AS [Budget Name]
	,			[SEGMENT1] AS [Entity]
	,			e.[Description] AS [Company Name]
	,			[SEGMENT2] AS [Cost Centre]
	,			c.[Description] AS [Cost Centre Description]
	,			[SEGMENT3] AS [Account Number]
	,			a.[Description] AS [Account Description]
	,			fr.[AccountDesc#5] AS [Account Category]
	,			[CURRENCY_CODE] AS [Currency]
	,			[PERIOD_NET_DR] AS [Net Debit]
	,			[PERIOD_NET_CR] AS [Net Credit]
	,			DATENAME(MONTH,CONCAT(CONCAT('20',RIGHT(gcc.[PERIOD_NAME],2)),'-',CAST(CASE WHEN gp.PERIOD_NUM = '13' THEN '12' ELSE RIGHT(CONCAT('0',gp.PERIOD_NUM),2) END AS INT),'-01')) + ' ' + CONCAT('20',RIGHT(gcc.[PERIOD_NAME],2)) AS [Date]
	,			LEFT([BUDGET_NAME],CHARINDEX(' ',[BUDGET_NAME])) AS [Budget Type]
	,			CASE 
					WHEN CAST([PERIOD_NET_DR] AS DECIMAL(28,2)) = 0
						THEN CAST([PERIOD_NET_CR] AS DECIMAL(28,2))
					ELSE CAST([PERIOD_NET_DR] AS DECIMAL(28,2))
				END AS [Budget]
	,			CONCAT([SEGMENT1],':',[CURRENCY_CODE],':',[SEGMENT3],':',[SEGMENT2],':',DATENAME(MONTH,CONCAT(CONCAT('20',RIGHT(gcc.[PERIOD_NAME],2)),'-',CAST(CASE WHEN gp.PERIOD_NUM = '13' THEN '12' ELSE RIGHT(CONCAT('0',gp.PERIOD_NUM),2) END AS INT),'-01')) + ' ' + CONCAT('20',RIGHT(gcc.[PERIOD_NAME],2))) AS [GL_Budget Link]
	,			CAST(GETDATE() AS DATE) AS [DateStamp]
	INTO		#BudgetBalances
	FROM		[RAW].[O.GL_BUDGET_BALANCES] gcc
	LEFT JOIN	[RAW].[O.GL_PERIODS] gp ON gp.PERIOD_NAME = gcc.PERIOD_NAME 
	LEFT JOIN	Core.GL_Descriptions e ON e.FLEX_VALUE = gcc.SEGMENT1 AND e.VALUE_CATEGORY = 'Company Argent'
	LEFT JOIN	Core.GL_Descriptions a ON a.FLEX_VALUE = gcc.SEGMENT3 AND a.VALUE_CATEGORY = 'Account Argent'
	LEFT JOIN	Core.GL_Descriptions c ON c.FLEX_VALUE = gcc.SEGMENT2 AND c.VALUE_CATEGORY = 'Cost Centre Argent'
	LEFT JOIN	[RAW].[F.FinanceReference] fr ON gcc.[SEGMENT3] = fr.[AccountDesc#9]

	SELECT		bb.*
	,			CASE
					WHEN LEFT([Entity],1) = '3'
						THEN IIF(CAST(LEFT([Account Number],1) AS INT) >= 4,[Budget]/ISNULL(fx1.[Rate_P&L],fx2.[Rate_P&L]),[Budget]/ISNULL(fx1.[Rate_BS],fx2.[Rate_P&L]))
					ELSE [Budget]
				END AS [Budget GBP]
	,			CASE
					WHEN LEFT([Entity],1) != '3'
						THEN IIF(CAST(LEFT([Account Number],1) AS INT) >= 4,[Budget]*ISNULL(fx1.[Rate_P&L],fx2.[Rate_P&L]),[Budget]*ISNULL(fx1.[Rate_BS],fx2.[Rate_P&L]))
					ELSE [Budget]
				END AS [Budget EUR]
	INTO		[Finance].[BudgetBalances]
	FROM		#BudgetBalances bb
	LEFT JOIN	[Finance].[FX_Rates] fx1
	ON			bb.[Date] = fx1.[Date]
	LEFT JOIN	(
					SELECT		*
					FROM		[Finance].[FX_Rates]
					WHERE		[Year] = YEAR(CAST(GETDATE() AS DATE))
					AND			[Month] = MONTH(CAST(GETDATE() AS DATE))
				) fx2
	ON			1 = 1

-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
-- 1.7	Manipulate FX Rates table
-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

	IF OBJECT_ID('tempdb..#Dates','U') IS NOT NULL DROP TABLE #Dates
	IF OBJECT_ID('tempdb..#FX_Rates_PreFillDown','U') IS NOT NULL DROP TABLE #FX_Rates_PreFillDown
	IF OBJECT_ID('[Finance].[FX_Rates]','U') IS NOT NULL DROP TABLE [Finance].[FX_Rates]

	;WITH CTE_Dates AS
	(
	    SELECT CONVERT(DATE, (
									SELECT		MIN(CAST(CONCAT([Year],'-',[Month],'-01') AS DATE))
									FROM		[RAW].[FX_Rates]
									WHERE		[Currency] IS NOT NULL
								)) AS Dates
	 
	    UNION ALL
	 
	    SELECT DATEADD(MONTH, 1, Dates)
	    FROM CTE_Dates
	    WHERE CONVERT(DATE, Dates) <= CONVERT(DATE, DATEADD(MONTH,-1,CAST(GETDATE() AS DATE)))
	)
	SELECT		ROW_NUMBER()OVER(ORDER BY [Dates]) AS [RowNumber]
	,			DATENAME(MONTH,Dates) + ' ' + DATENAME(YEAR, Dates) AS [Date]
	INTO		#Dates
	FROM		CTE_Dates

	SELECT		fx.[Currency]
	,			fx.[Rate_BS]
	,			fx.[Rate_P&L]
	,			fx.[Version]
	,			fx.[Year]
	,			fx.[Month]
	,			d.[Date]
	INTO		#FX_Rates_PreFillDown
	FROM		(
					SELECT		*
					,			ROW_NUMBER()OVER(ORDER BY CAST(CONCAT([Year],'-',[Month],'-01') AS DATE)) AS [RowNumber]
					FROM		[RAW].[FX_Rates]
					WHERE		[Currency] IS NOT NULL
				) fx
	FULL JOIN	#Dates d
	ON			fx.[RowNumber] = d.[RowNumber]



	SELECT		FIRST_VALUE([Currency]) OVER (PARTITION BY [Currency Group] ORDER BY CAST([Date] AS DATE)) AS [Currency]
	,			FIRST_VALUE([Rate_BS]) OVER (PARTITION BY [Rate_BS Group] ORDER BY CAST([Date] AS DATE)) AS [Rate_BS]
	,			FIRST_VALUE([Rate_P&L]) OVER (PARTITION BY [Rate_P&L Group] ORDER BY CAST([Date] AS DATE)) AS [Rate_P&L]
	,			ISNULL([Version],'Rolled Forwards')		AS [Version]
	,			ISNULL([Year],RIGHT([Date],4))			AS [Year]
	,			ISNULL([Month],DATEPART(MM,[Date]))		AS [Month]
	,			[Date]
	INTO		[Finance].[FX_Rates]
	FROM		(
					SELECT		*
					,			COUNT([Currency]) OVER (ORDER BY CAST([Date] AS DATE)) AS [Currency Group]
					,			COUNT([Rate_BS]) OVER (ORDER BY CAST([Date] AS DATE)) AS [Rate_BS Group]
					,			COUNT([Rate_P&L]) OVER (ORDER BY CAST([Date] AS DATE)) AS [Rate_P&L Group]
					FROM		#FX_Rates_PreFillDown
				) fx3
